alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 9:21PM CDT until July 30 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Crawford County in southeastern Kansas... Barton County in southwestern Missouri... Cedar County in southwestern Missouri... Dade County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 920 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rich Hill, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Pittsburg, Stockton Lake, Prairie State Park, Stockton State Park, Lamar, El Dorado Springs, Frontenac, Girard, Stockton, Arma, Greenfield, Lockwood, Golden City, Liberal, Cherokee, Mulberry, Chicopee, Mccune, Nashville and Mindenmines. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 57 and 75. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. This storm is producing widespread wind damage across Kansas City. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
